archives

  • December 06, 2013

    Sass Media Query Helper For Designers

    A configurable design helper that displays the current min-width media query in the bottom right corner of your screen and updates as you re-size the browser window. When designing in the browser, you'll know exactly which media query you can add styles to when things start to look weird.

  • October 06, 2013

    Boilerplate

    Front-end tool for generating static sites with Grunt, Bower, Assemble, Sass, Bourbon, Bourbon Neat.

  • July 23, 2013

    Hello Jekyll

    My new website runs on Jekyll. Yay for static site generators!

  • May 13, 2013

    Omega Reset For Bourbon Neat

    A Sass mixin for Bourbon Neat that let's you change the number of columns at any breakpoint.

  • May 01, 2013

    Random notes, things I just want to remember, or quite possibly future post ideas.
